resources.string: To make the most out of Basic Budget, follow these tips:
Select a budget period (Weekly, Biweekly or Monthly) and enter your regular expenses, such as \'Rent\' and \'Groceries\'.
Use the \'Savings\' description to keep track of your savings. This category does not count towards your total expenses. You can view your average and total savings in the Statistics screen.

Use the food descriptions - \'Food\', \'Groceries\', \'Breakfast\', \'Lunch\', \'Dinner\' - to keep track of your total food expenses. You can view your average food expenses in the Statistics screen.
